channel.title: Adding Shop To 525 Server
channel.description:
Hello guys, I am using Xx-scape 525 Server ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,378034.0.html )theres no NPC coded in the shop. Its just an empty shop without NPC. I want to add shops. Can anyone teach me how to add NPC to varrock shops and allow it to buy and sell thing.
Thanks,
